SEARCH
Package model

Class DatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
model.DatabaseConnector
public class DatabaseConnector extends Object
Manages the connection and operations with the MySQL database.

This class provides methods to interact with the database, such as executing queries, inserting data, hashing passwords, and managing database connections.

Since:
2024-06-23

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseConnector

      public DatabaseConnector()
      Constructs a DatabaseConnector object and initializes the database connection.

      It also registers the MySQL JDBC driver and attempts to establish a connection to the specified database.

  • Method Details

    • getConnect

      public static Connection getConnect()
      Returns the current database connection instance.
      Returns:
      the Connection object representing the database connection

    • getInstance

      public static DatabaseConnector getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the DatabaseConnector class.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of DatabaseConnector

    • generateSalt

      public static byte[] generateSalt(int saltIteration)
      Generates a salt of specified length using a secure random number generator.
      Parameters:
      saltIteration - the length of the salt to generate
      Returns:
      a byte array representing the generated salt

    • encryptPBKDF2

      public static String encryptPBKDF2(String password, byte[] salt)
      Encrypts the given password using PBKDF2 algorithm with HMAC SHA-256.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to encrypt
      salt - the salt used in encryption
      Returns:
      a string containing the base64 encoded salt and hash separated by a delimiter

    • verifyPassword

      public static boolean verifyPassword(String inputPassword, String storedPassword, byte[] salt)
      Verifies the given password against the stored password hash using PBKDF2 algorithm with HMAC SHA-256.
      Parameters:
      inputPassword - the password to verify
      storedPassword - the stored password hash and salt
      salt - the salt used in the stored password hash
      Returns:
      true if the input password matches the stored password, false otherwise

    • countFoundTrain

      public int countFoundTrain(String stasiunAwal, String stasiunAkhir, Date tanggal)
      Counts the number of trains available between the specified stations and date.
      Parameters:
      stasiunAwal - the starting station
      stasiunAkhir - the ending station
      tanggal - the departure date
      Returns:
      the number of trains available

    • findSpecificTrain

      public ResultSet findSpecificTrain(String stasiunAwal, String stasiunAkhir, Date tanggal)
      Retrieves all trains between the specified stations and date.
      Parameters:
      stasiunAwal - the starting station
      stasiunAkhir - the ending station
      tanggal - the departure date
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing all matching train records

    • buildTableModel

      public static DefaultTableModel buildTableModel(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Constructs a DefaultTableModel based on the provided ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      rs - the ResultSet containing the data
      Returns:
      a DefaultTableModel representing the ResultSet data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • findAll

      public ResultSet findAll(String table)
      Executes a query to retrieve all records from a specified table.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table to query.
      Returns:
      A ResultSet object containing the results of the query.

    • findWhere

      public ResultSet findWhere(String table, String columnName, String keyword)
      Executes a query to retrieve records from a specified table where a specific column matches a keyword.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table to query.
      columnName - The name of the column to match.
      keyword - The keyword to match against the column.
      Returns:
      A ResultSet object containing the results of the query.

    • executeQuery

      public ResultSet executeQuery(String execute)
      Executes a SQL query and returns the result as a ResultSet.
      Parameters:
      execute - The SQL query to execute.
      Returns:
      A ResultSet object containing the results of the query.

    • insert

      public boolean insert(String table, boolean withID, String... value)
      Inserts a new record into a specified table.
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table to insert into.
      withID - Indicates whether to include an ID column in the insert.
      value - The values to insert into the table.
      Returns:
      true if the insertion was successful, false otherwise.

      public boolean checkForDatabase(String database) throws SQLException
      Checks if a database with the specified name exists.

      Returns:
      true if the database exists, false otherwise.

      Parameters:

      columnName - The name of the column to match.
      keyword - The keyword to match against the column.
      Returns:
      The number of rows matching the criteria.

    • hashPassword

      public String hashPassword(String str)
      Hashes a password using PBKDF2 with a random salt and returns the hashed password as a string.
      Parameters:
      str - The password to hash.
      Returns:
      A string containing the Base64-encoded salt followed by the Base64-encoded hashed password.
